data.title: What's Going On With Aclarion Stock Tuesday?
data.description: Aclarion stock is trading higher on Tuesday after the company announced it secured funding for its CLARITY trial of its diagnostic tool, Nociscan.

data.title: Fox Q2 Earnings: Revenue And EPS Beat, Fall Sports Schedule and Election Cycle Drove Performance, Plans New Streaming Service
data.description: Fox Corp (FOXA) beats analyst estimates, reports strong revenue and profit growth, plans for direct-to-consumer streaming service in 2025.

data.title: McEwen Boosts Grey Fox Resources, Issues 2025 Guidance
data.description: McEwen Mining (MUX) has expanded Grey Fox's gold resource by 32% to 1.54 million oz and doubled inferred resources to 458,000 oz in Northern Ontario.

data.title: TRUMP Meme Coin Down 42% In A Week: How Low Can It Go?
data.description: The Trump (CRYPTO: TRUMP) meme coin has plunged 42.6% in the past week, following Donald Trump's tariff announcementâ€”a sharp reversal for the high-flying meme crypto.

data.title: Simplify Launches FOXY ETF To Navigate FX Volatility, Tariff Uncertainty
data.description: Simplify Asset Management launched FOXY, an actively managed ETF designed to benefit from currency market dynamics amid global volatility and trade policies.
